comment: Aur smarty, Pehla flatmate hi aisa mil jae to aur kya chahiye. Baki ka itna idea nhi pr ek chiz to pakka se common hai tere aur mere me🙃. Kaash tere se advice le leta ek chiz ki🫠, aur faltu chizo ki tension mat liya kr ykwim... samjha. varna bhot pitega. Aur haan.. reh sakte hai saath me🤘.
name: Yashraj Solanki

comment:
kya re BKL, Saath me ek train se aaye the campus, ek train se jane ka spna reh jayega. Dekh bakchod or bakait to tu hai hi, isiliye mera itta accha dost hai ( do bhai dono tabahi 🙂), don't let this fade away (mai check krta rhunga). Jyada load mt lena, sab theek hoga. 
Stay happy and connected🙌.
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment:
was with me whenever I needed and also when I didn't 😂. abhi kollege se nikalke kya hi krenge smjh nhi aa rha.😮‍💨 kaha ghumenge samosa, oreo, missions, POD, rr, my gut feeling says, you've got a good time ahead, kuch problem ayi to we'll smash it up too damn easily
Rap koncert chl lete h sathme
name: Sahil Singh Shekhawat

comment: Best banda fr bhai. Saari masti me sbse aage, fatti to kisi k baap se nhi. Ek disco lagane ka sapna reh hi gya pr(border touch krli thi)🙂. 318 ka special member jiska koi room nhi h😂. Bakchodi krne me peeche nhi hatta kbhi, dil ka boht achha h bas fefde thode kharab h😂. W person with W playlist
name: Ayush Maheshwari

comment:
Kya re fuddu aadmi
Bohot kuch seekha hai tere se(iykyk😂)
Thanks meri itni nonsense yapping sunne ke liye aur bore na hone ke liye🙌🏻 Woh cafe house trips aur terrace pr baithna sheesh memory bhai🔥Kam time Mila but still bohot bakchodi maari hai apan dono ne🫂 All the best and keep smiling 😁
name: Bhavya Singh Thakur

comment:
A senior that you can treat like a friend, the dream.
Jokes apart.
One of the most "genuine" guys, one will ever meet.
Simple, but not so sober.
I met him during TEDx23 and I knew then and there that this is a guy I can always count on.
Will miss you my brother :)
name: Manya Jain

comment: My first point of contact to share bt. Thanks meri faltu baate sunne ke liye 😊 . Milte rehna bhai. Baki teri cream ke dabbe me pani dalne vala din aur darvaze ke liye ladne vala part kabhi nhi bhulunga 🤣. Bully bahot kiya tune but tere se pure heart nahi dekha maine, Take care lil qt !!!
name: Garvit Gupta

comment: Bro was the first one to show me around the campus after quarantine. Bro has a really charismatic smile. If anyone has worse luck than me, it's him 😂. A core member of 301, had countless moments but I'll never forget the flamethrower we made. Bas kuch chize chhod de or khush raha kar ✌🏻.
name: Varun Kumar

comment: Bhai kya banda hai yaar tu🫡🫡. Tujhe mai kabhi samjh nahi paaya. Legit one of the best guys out there😌😌. Always ready to help. College me kya kya kara hai humne yaha bata nahi sakta 😈😈. Too much fun with you.🥹🥹
name: Ayush

comment: Abbe cafe house chalega.... Seedhe maut ke concert soon..... Pehle jitna socha, milne ke baad tu soch se zyada cht**a nikla. Jk man with great heart and always helped me in desperate times. Hope to meet u soon 🫡
name: Paras Vyas

comment: Bhai ka system ekdum set hai bakchodi me no compromise tere saath thodi thodi mene bhi seekhli. Valo me koi bhi agent khila lo game sense on top hai. Baaki tension to katai nhi leta ye. Thanks bhai summer me itni saari bakchodi karane ke liye aur valo me rank push karte rahenge saath me.
name: Yogesh Mohan Dantare

comment: Bhai tu handsome to bht hai...Pta nhi ladkiyaan kyu approach nhi krti tujhe 🥹 Aur apni gehri dosti to Mussorie trip se hi shuru huyi thi..usse pehle to apan naam ke hi dost the.. aur tu kaafi chill Banda hai bhai..jaldi se yadav pariwar ka naam Roshan kr.... All the best
name: Manav Kumar Sinha

comment: This bitch is too sexy,tujhe jab bhi dekha mann main aaya ki tujhe ladki hona chahiye tha🌚...pro valo player....alag charm hai bhai ka....bro is chill af ...khurafati to hai hi....I love your tiny circles....zyada chidiya mat udaya kar wrna maksad tujhpe hi pura kr dunga...
name: Kunwar zeeshan

comment: Enjoy life bhai and I know you'll do awesome stuff so believe in yourself. Always my companion in practical and projects but kitna kaam kia h be toone🤨🤣. Khush reh bhai and milte rehna. Gg and valo pr aate rehna.
name: PARTH DWIVEDI

comment: Had a very great time with you in summer. Without you humara summer acha nahi jata .. Full bakchodi mode on rehta tha humesha.. valo tere saath he khelna chalu Kiya .. Dil kaa bohot saaf admi humesha sabko hasane wala .. keep smiling brother and aur kabhi koi problem ho toh Tera Bhai hai idhar khada
name: Badal

comment: The chitchatter in online and ambivert in offline 👉👈. Thanks for giving an above average radha krishna songs suggestion.
name: Riya

comment: Very good trip planner mussoorie was great with u guys and u r always ready to help others. Tu m himanshu parth sahil ne online m random grps m boht bkc kari h😂 Maja aaya boht tumhare sath, All the best bro for everything and bhul na jaana🙂 or bkc Kam mat karna!

comment: A great guy, just with some out of luck.Keep hustling wou will achieve what you need to. 318 Supremacy.
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: Piyush, samjhdar guy in the campus, pr bahot bakchodi krta h pr theek hai, chalta h. I wish you get the best. Don't take stress. By the way, which Bhavya do you prefer👀?
name: Pranjali Gavhale

comment: Tere saath jyada time toh spend nahi kara, but still I remember those days during 4th semester. "Saale meri PDP lene ke liye bande laya tha tu, jab me quarantine me tha aur tu bhar, alag hi maje aaye the us din." Best of luck for future,
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Best of luck for everything bro. Be happy and have fun.

comment: The smart londa of the group.. The trip planner.. ML project partner (inke bina chize nhi ho pati)... Pro comder... All the best for your future bro.. Keep shining
